text: "Scream" is a song by American singers and siblings Michael and Janet Jackson, released in 1995 as part of Michael's album HIStory: Past, Present and Future, Book I. The song is notable for its powerful themes of social justice and personal struggles, addressing the media's treatment of both artists and societal issues. The track features a distinct electronic sound combined with a strong beat, showcasing both Michael and Janet's vocal talents. The accompanying music video is also famous for its innovative choreography and visual effects, emphasizing the song's themes of frustration and rebellion. "Scream" received critical acclaim and was a commercial success, reaching high positions on various music charts around the world. It remains a significant collaboration in pop music history. Category:1995 songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:Janet Jackson songs
title: Scream (Michael Jackson and Janet Jackson song)
